website_summaries.verdict: Steve Madden Lancer translates the brand’s addiction to fresh styles as this easy-to-wear shoe is made cool and comfy with a sock-like composition.Buyers loved the comfort, flexibility, and breathability of this lifestyle kick. It remains affordable despite its luxurious textile set up. The lacing design doesn’t affect much in the overall fit, but it adds styling to the feminine cut. Although keeping the upper tidy can be quite an effort, the muted color schemes allow users the freedom to put on this charmer with strings of casual clothing.
pros: Consumers can’t be happier with the well-made textile wrapping on the Steve Madden Lancer sneaker that does not wear out quickly
Several users who adored its slip-on style ended up purchasing additional pairs in other shades
Many deemed this easy-to-wear Lancer kick ideal for everyday use
As conveyed by one reviewer, the relaxed feeling inside the shoe is close to wearing slippers outdoors
Several wearers specified that there’s enough breathing space in the toe box which offer optimal comfort
The minimal and versatile makeup of the Lancer sneaker by Steve Madden is easy to work into lots of outfits
Many who loved its slip-on feature were not bothered having the wide laces left untied
The width is just right, as told by a considerable volume of reviewers
The close-fitting upper warmly hugs the foot and keeps it protected against external elements, remarked by some
Many who have high praises for this comfy Steve Madden women’s Lancer fashion sneaker ended up endorsing it to other potential users
Some buyers highlighted that its platform sole adds a bit of height
It isn’t hard to bag up this shoe as it comes very affordable
cons: A few noted that the light-colored fabric on the Steve Madden shoe collects dirt, scuff, and grime quickly which are quite tricky to clean up
This lifestyle sneaker tends to be a tad long, relayed by a couple of reviewers

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They seem pretty narrow, but I have slender feet, so they felt perfect to me! I got my usual 7.5 and there was a smidge of room, but I don’t think it would be enough to size down. The pink color is also slightly less bright, but still totally cute. A true “blush” color. They also felt a little flat on the soles, but that is typical for a sneaker. I got arch support inserts and they are now perfect! Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, not the greatest picture but worked perfectly with my outfit
customer_reviews.author: Kara Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they fit me as expected and are comfortable for a long day of wear. My only gripe is they are quite heavy, if you are expecting something lightweight, these are not the shoes for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlyn Lester

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much, that I paid extra money for them. I saw these in Minneapolis, for $20 cheaper, however not in my size. I looked online and finally found these. They are cute as can be, and comfortable. They are a bit narrow in the toe box, but after wearing them for awhile, seem to be good. I am thinking about ordering them in red.
customer_reviews.author: sisu

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shoes but then returned them when i tried them on. I wear a size 8 and they made my foot look ginomous. Not the makers fault but i just didn't like how they looked on me. I also kept tripping when i had them on.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: ... several reviews to get half a smaller size I’m glad I decided to select my actual shoe size
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews to get half a smaller size I’m glad I decided to select my actual shoe size. It has a slight space left but I rather fit like that instead of rubbing against the back of my heel. Would’ve given 5 stars if they were made more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: VBR

customer_reviews.title: They’re so adorably cute!!
customer_reviews.text: My life partner likes to buy things and return them, I think she gets a thrill knowing someone far away is packing and shipping off an item with her name on it. but these she kept.. so adorably cute and so expensive looking.. the color is more flesh color than pink like the picture and against a bare leg it isn’t appealing but with the stretch jeans she likes.. wow.. I highly recommend and will most likely buy every color.. because you can wear a shoe 2 says in a row.. i think it’s bad luck..
customer_reviews.author: Barry S.

customer_reviews.title: Walking on a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable sneakers ever! I feel as if I'm walking on a cushy cloud. I really need a wide width, but that's not available in these shoes, so I had to buy a size larger than I usually do, but I can put on thicker socks or put in pads so the shoes don't slip too much. I love these shoes so much that I'm considering buying another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Donlon

customer_reviews.title: These are my new favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite shoes!!! They are so so comfy and SO cute!! I have only worn them one day but got so many compliments on them. WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO ANYONE.
customer_reviews.author: emilyann

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than Buckle
customer_reviews.text: I wish the sole was black but oh well. Sock like opening to this shoe. May have problems with wide feet or swelling.
customer_reviews.author: daremi

customer_reviews.title: Order half size lower
customer_reviews.text: Im normally a size 8, but a 7.5 fit perfect. The shoe does feel flat and narrow so i wouldnt recommened if you have wide feet. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Char H

customer_reviews.title: Buy a larger size and get a shoehorn.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this you more stars because it is a nice looking shoe. However, it is the hardest shoe to get on. I had to buy a shoehorn in order to get my foot slipped down into the heel. Btw I bought a larger size than what I normally take.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Wirth

customer_reviews.title: Cute, strange fit though
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this shoe, so cute! The fit is a little weird. I wouldn't say it fits the best, not the most comfortable, but I bought it online, without trying it on. I still wear it often, for fun and cuteness:)
customer_reviews.author: Bigler

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a size 8
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but they run a 1/2 size too big

customer_reviews.title: A little big but....
customer_reviews.text: I love there shoes but they are a little big. I normally fit a 7.5 just fine but I could have definitely gone down one size. Nonetheless they are so cute I'm going to make them work!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: I really like the design of these shoes and they're Steve Madden ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of these shoes and they're Steve Madden so you would think they'd be of nicer quality but these shoes feel so cheaply made. And they are so narrow its unbelievable. Hated them the second I tried them on. I could totally see the little bands holding the shoe laces together breaking easily.
customer_reviews.author: WMAC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute shoes. My daughter and I both have a pair and love them. Very stylish, true to size. Very comfortable! Great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Good looking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker is well made and comfortable to wear. However, the insole does not have arch support. So, if you like me has high arches; then, buy a pair is arch supports for comfort.

customer_reviews.title: Best gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife on mother’s day and she is obsessed. I got her the nudes/blush ones and they look great on her. Extremely comfortable and stylish.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but should be labeled as 'Narrow'

customer_reviews.text: These are super cute! Previous comments are correct in ordering a 1/2 to full size smaller; However, if you have high arches you will not be able to get these babies on. They are slip-on and have no give between the tongue and heel of the shoe – Had to return.

customer_reviews.text: Liked the shoes, but they run large. Couldn't replace with my size so they are being returned. Had to order smaller size elsewhere.

customer_reviews.text: She is a nice blush color. Order a size down. They run large.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing down wasn't a good idea for me...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews (and other bloggers who styled these shoes) and decided to size down a half a size. I now regret that. Maybe it's my wide foot, but sizing down was too tight and borderline uncomfortable. I am returning for my regular size. The package shipped quickly and arrived within 2 days even without Prime.

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: These were just okay. Not special enough to keep for the price. They do run true to size though.

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe. The size length is good but the medium width feels like a narrow width. Hopefully, they will “break in” and feel less tight.

customer_reviews.text: Look really cute. Fit as expected for shoe size. Sole not supportive and ankle slides. Still on the fence about keeping them. I just love the unique look.

customer_reviews.title: N/A

It only looks good if you wear boot cut pants which means the full shoe will not show . Unless you want people to think you have wide feet when you really don’t . But other then that the shoe is a cute sneaker

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes! Must have shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolute best shoes I have ever bought. SO COMFY PEOPLE! I first ordered the olive color and after two days of wearing them I immediately ordered a second pair — the blush ones! I get so many compliments on them. I’ve also bought a few pair for gifts and the receivers LOVE them! All of mine have arrived in perfect condition, no frayed laces or anything. Fit is true to size. I have a wide foot and ankle and can easily pull them on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute in pictures, unfortunately not picture perfect :(
customer_reviews.text: These very cute shoes run very large. I am normally a 7.5 in shoes. I first ordered a 7.5 they were way too big. I then ordered a 7, which were also too big. I personally found these to be awkward with the raised platform bottom and was very disappointed in the sizing. If you are used to heels or the platform style you may like this shoe better.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and style of these shoes. My only con is lack of arch support but I easily fixed that by adding inserts which may have been better for me anyway. The shoes are otherwise very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Khara Bailey

product_meta.title: Steve Madden Women's Lancer Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: Asymmetry and extra-wide-set lacing make lancer one of this season’s hippest sneakers, while a sleek monochromatic color palette appeals to refined sensibilities. style as the perfect punctuation for sophisticated athleisure getups.
